input.sentences: my wife was dressed in a very lovely white dress .
we all gathered together for that occasion .
i had a lot of family members who showed me support .
my mom and dad were together as well .
the bride and the uncle were taking pictures beforehand .
output.sentences: Hannah, on her wedding day, looked so lovely, smiling and very happy she had made the choice to have an outdoor wedding.
The family members milled around before the ceremony, some of them meeting for the very first time.
Everyone was properly respectufl, waiting for the big moment to happen.
A few, like Sally and her husband, waited inside and looked at some pictures of the soon-to-be happy couple.
Hannah soon appeared to make her last walk as a single woman, on the arm of her debonair and very supportive dad.
